content: **knitted baby blanket with wave pattern in drops merino extra fine or sky** measurements approx 65 x 80 cm / 25½ x 31½ materials drops merino extra fine from garnstudio 400 g color no 01 off-white or use drops sky from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 250 gr colour no 01 white drops circular needle size 4 5 mm / us 7 80 cm / 32 or size needed to get 20 sts x 26 row in stockinette st = 10 x 10 cm / 4 x 4 drops crochet hook size 3 5 mm / us e/4
